extendedInfo.description: Starbucks secret menu is finally available to everyone with over 75 Drinks! Ever wonder what a "Zebra Mocha" is? How about a "Dirty Chai"? These are 2 of the secret drinks that are known only to a few Starbucks insiders. This app has over 75 secret drink recipes that can be made at Starbucks. Everything Starbucks has to offer from banana splits to raspberry passion teas. We made this app so that you can finally try these delicious drinks!Rather than asking for the drinks by name, this app will show the barista taking your order the exact instructions how to make each drink. These drinks are SECRET there a on a hidden menu!! So not all Starbucks Employees know how to make each drink.Don't settle for the same old coffee fix, don't settle for the same old cup, magic blends make tasty Coffee and Tea Creations.  Its simple, fast and efficient, and has 2 separate ordering methods in case you are in a drive-through Starbucks location or want an alternative ordering method. This app does not act as a paying method like starbucks card mobile app does. It shows the barista how to make the drink in the exact way it should be made!Hidden menu Secret Drinks is an independently developed application from JRG Software. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by Starbucks Corporation. These drinks are not made up by Starbucks Corporation.

reviews.title: Must have for Starbucks Addict
reviews.comment: Took a chance on this app for $1. Must say, it\'s very polished and easy to use. Found secret drinks I never heard or thought of before. Has easy to read instructions for ordering. If you go to Starbucks a few times a week, you should get this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Incorrect
reviews.comment: While this app is a very cool idea it has many mistakes in it so be AWARE that when ordering at starbucks to reduce confusion please use their drink sizes (ex. Short, tall, grande, venti) and when ordering frappacinos please dont call it a frapp... The reason for this is if everyone keeps to a standard way of ordering it will reduce confusion and will expedite the process allowing you to enjoy your drink so much faster:)
reviews.author: Samara Nelson

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I dont understand why they dont give extra large instructions for more of the iced drinks. Other than that I love it.
reviews.author: samantha meraz

reviews.title: Nice, but...
reviews.comment: When are there going to be new drink updates?  I\'ve had this app for a while now and nothing new has come out.
reviews.author: Mark Rowley

reviews.title: Very nice looking site but not helpful with Starbucks employees
reviews.comment: Most employees gave no idea how to make the secret drinks so you dtill have to do a web search to find directions.
reviews.author: Joanne Smith

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Wow I never knew all these drinks existed! I love it and all my friends do to. Good job!
reviews.author: Cindy Gilbert

reviews.title: Oh snap
reviews.comment: I now have a reason to go to Starbucks. That\'s how amazing it is....
reviews.author: Anthony Urquieta

reviews.title: Wrong
reviews.comment: Please pit Frappuccino instead of frap. It makes it sound like we are mcdonalds or burger king. We are not we are Mich better. Again... FRAPPUCCINO not FRAP
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app fot Starbucks drinks!
reviews.comment: Open my world to drinks I didn\'t even know existed at Starbucks. Highly recommended for coffee lovers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Please add the option to share a recipe via text message or fb.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Download This App
reviews.comment: Excellent app for Starbucks lovers. Try the snickerdoodle or apple pie. Sinfully good.
reviews.author: Shari Fox

reviews.title: my type of menu
reviews.comment: Great app love the new choices of drinks available and how to order them like a pro
reviews.author: A Google User
